pre_install: if (-not $global) { Write-Host "This package requires global installation. Please install using --global."; exit 1 }
post_install:
if (!(Test-Path "$persist_dir\service.xml")) { New-Item -Path "$persist_dir\service.xml" -ItemType File -Value "<service>
  <id>victoriametrics-agent</id>
  <name>Victoria Metrics Agent</name>
  <description>Victoria Metrics Agent scrapes Prometheus-style metrics and sends them to a central Victoria Metrics TSDB.</description>
  <executable>$dir\vmagent.exe</executable>
  <arguments>-memory.allowedBytes=128MiB -enableTCP6 -httpListenAddr=:8429 -graphiteListenAddr=:2003 -promscrape.config="$persist_dir\scrape.yml"</arguments>
  <log mode="roll"></log>
</service>" }
description: VictoriaMetrics: fast, cost-effective monitoring solution and time series database
